title: Advice to a Prophet - "word of the weapons"

content.prompt: According to the speaker, the prophet’s “word of the weapons” (line 5) will probably not be heeded because

choices.label: men and women are more concerned with love than with weapons
people have heard such talk too often before
people cannot comprehend abstract descriptions of power
